html_lawbox:
63 F.2d 1007 (1932)

KENTUCKY RIVER COAL CORPORATION
v.
Robert H. LUCAS, Formerly Collector of Internal Revenue for District of Kentucky.

No. 6048.

Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit.

December 8, 1932.

*1008 Woodward, Hamilton & Hobson, of Louisville, Ky., for appellant.

Frank A. Ropke, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Louisville, Ky., for appellee.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment of District Court [51 F.(2d) 586] affirmed.
